parameters: \fi\C[7]This door looks like it leads to a bedroom. It's locked, so I can't get in.
\fi\C[7]Some bronze knives. They look recently forged.
Hey, \P[1]! Did you bring me what I asked for?
Uh... what did you need again?
\fi\C[8]You did. And the wolves didn't even eat you. Imagine that!
Thanks. You've really helped me out. Here, take this.
Now you can craft items for yourself.
You only need to know how to make the items. I left a small recipe in the
crafting kit for you to practice.
Let me know if you need anything. Besides medicinal products, I stock a whole
host of items the villagers need.
You've obtained a basic crafting kit. It's too heavy to carry, so it will have
Ah. Not quite. I still need those materials. They're not going to fetch
Uh... what did you need again?
I'll write it down for you.
Remember, you can always check your progress by clicking on Quests in your
Menu. Just press X to get there.
Don't forget to try that crafting kit I gave you. It's in your house. And I'll buy
anything else you gather. I promise I'll give you a fair price.
\fi\C[8]Fair in the sense that I take total advantage of you, that is.
Do you want to do some trading now?
Come back once in a while.
Do you want to do some trading now?
Do you want to do some trading now?
Do you want to do some trading now?
Y'all come back now, ya hear?
Do you want to do some trading now?
I can't help but think you're getting the better of these deals.
\fi\C[8]I wonder if it's really safe to just leave documents out like this.
\fi\C[8]Some primitive notes on medical treatments. I'm glad this guy's not my doctor!
\fi\C[8]Some random ingredents. Doesn't look like he's low, but, then again, I
wouldn't know what all he needs.
\fi\C[8]Water and what looks like some sort of tea.
\P[1], I hear you're running errands for everyone else
around the village. You might as well do something for me.
\fi\C[8] This guy is blunt. But Zabkiel said I should help out. And Adataneses said
Abihu was making nails for the Ark.\fr\C[0]
Sure. What can I do for you?
Adataneses came to see me about making some nails. Unfortunately, my mold
for nails broke after the last time I made her some. I need some
Uh... okay. My memory is a bit sketchy after the accident. Is this something
Of course, you have! What? You can remember how to help everyone else, but
I'll help, I'll help. Just tell me, how exactly do I get rockdust?
\fi*Sigh*\fr You go to the Cave just east of here and break some soft rocks. It’s
called "rockdust" for a reason. Now, go on.
Where's my rockdust? I can't make these nails without it.
Did you get my rockdust for me yet?
Do I look stupid to you? Go get my rockdust!
Couldn't figure out how to break the rocks, could you? I was wondering when
you'd come wandering back. You really did go soft in the head.
Take this and go get my rockdust.
Did you get my rockdust for me yet?
Good job! You managed to do something right. Now, it should only take me a
little while to make these nails.
Oh, and if you find any more rockdust, take it to Hiram so we can buy it off
ya. I hate leaving the shop to go get it.
I can't make a mold out of this. There isn't enough!
Does it look I'm finished with the nails yet? Because I'm not.
I was almost finished with Adataneses' nails, but then I ran out of wood the for
the fire. Think you can go chop me some? I'll give you one of my daggers if you
\C[3]Five logs of Firewood\C[0] should do it.
Do you have that wood yet?
All right. Let me get the fire going, and the nails should be finished pretty
\fi\C[8]It's not a very good Dagger. I was probably going to melt it back down,
If you feel like chopping more wood, Hiram'll buy it off ya. I'm a blacksmith,
But you might want to check what's happening outside. It sounds like Abner's
Five! That's 1, 2, 3, 4, 5. I need 5 cords. No less.
Just a little longer on the nails.
The nails are finally finished. Take 'em to Adataneses. You'll find that silly Ark
GabText You received a \i[211]\C[1] a Jar of Nails\C[0]!
Why do you think the Ark is silly?
What do you mean, why do I think it's silly? Because they keep talkin' about
water fallin' out of the sky to drown everybody if we don't repent of our sins
and follow their god. Water's never come out of the sky and it never will!
But what do I care? As long as they keep paying for nails and whatnot, let 'em
You better get those nails to Adataneses. You're making me look bad with a slow
What now? Don't tell me you forget the way to the Ark. It's through the
Corrupted bats are attacking the village! Granny Laken said you could give me
a Pick to help route them out of the caves.
Who's Granny Laken? I'm not just going to give you another one of my tools!
On second thought, go ahead and take it. Maybe it'll help you bring me more
Did you find anything good with that pick I gave you? I heard people used to
be able to visit the grave of some old blacksmith before the cave-ins
You cleared out the bats, eh? Well, good for you.
